entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 11:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: NE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the evening then changing to ice pellets mixed with snow before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
